bn.core

Interface CPT

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPT

    public interface CPT
    A conditional probability table (CPT) for a RandomVariable in a BayesianNetwork gives a probability, for each Value in the variable's Domain, for every possible assignment of Values to its parents. So this could be a Map, but I'm not going to define it that way just yet.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double get(Value value, Assignment assignment)
      Return the probability of the given Value for this CPT's RandomVariable, given the values of its parents in the given Assignment.
      RandomVariable getVariable()
      Return the RandomVariable for this CPT.
      void set(Value value, Assignment assignment, double p)
      Set the probability of the given Value for this CPT's RandomVariable, given the values of its parents in the given Assignment, to p.

    • Method Detail

      • getVariable

        RandomVariable getVariable()
        Return the RandomVariable for this CPT.

      • set

        void set(Value value,
         Assignment assignment,
         double p)
        Set the probability of the given Value for this CPT's RandomVariable, given the values of its parents in the given Assignment, to p.

      • get

        double get(Value value,
           Assignment assignment)
        Return the probability of the given Value for this CPT's RandomVariable, given the values of its parents in the given Assignment. Note that the assignment may contain values for variables other than this CPT's variable (but it must contain at least values for the parents or an error will occur).
